title: Kim Sledge: ‘When “We Are Family” came out, we’d had two weeks off in two years’
text:
Kim Sledge is a member of Sister Sledge, a group she formed with her three siblings, Debbie, Joni and Kathy, in the early Seventies.

The band, renowned for its disco music, achieved phenomenal success with the album We Are Family. The title track and the single, He’s The Greatest Dancer, topped the R&B and dance charts in America and made it into the British top 10.

Sledge, 62, lives in Bucks County, Pennsylvania, and has three children.

How did your childhood mould your attitude to wealth?

Money was tight. My mother worked three jobs and it was hard for her.

At one of her jobs, the boss and his wife were very concerned about this single parent with five children (including my half-sister Carol)...
description: Kim Sledge is a member of Sister Sledge, a group she formed with her three siblings, Debbie, Joni and Kathy, in the early Seventies.
